item.description:
After a holiday hiatus, we are glad to say that we do have a Boston CiviCRM Meetup for January! Many thanks to Annie Cardinaux and the NEXUS Resource Center for hosting us!!

Here is a draft agenda, suggestions welcome:
6:30 - 7:00 Intros & a go-round of how people are using CiviCRM and how they plan to in the future.
7:00 - 7:45 Presentations on specific implementations of CiviCRM
7:45 - 8:30 A sustainable future for the Boston CiviCRM Meetup group

We are currently looking for volunteers to make a presentation (between 5 and 15 minutes) on their current implementations of CiviCRM -- both out-of-the-box and customized. We can set up a projector, just let us know! There are 8 PCs in the Cyber Lounge (http://www.nexusbosto...)

Location & Directions

NEXUS is located in downtown Boston at 38 Chauncy Street, 7th Floor.

We encourage you to take public transit to NEXUS!

MAP

Via the MBTA from the red, orange, green, or silver lines.

From Downtown Crossing (red & orange lines): Exit through the Chauncy Street exit. Take a right and walk down half a block. 38 Chauncy Street is across the street on your left.

From South Station (red line & silver line): Cross Atlantic Avenue and continue on Summer Street for four blocks. Turn left on Chauncy Street. 38 Chauncy Street is half a block down on your left.

From Park Street (green line): Cross Tremont Street away from the Boston Commons. Walk down Winter Street for one block. Cross Washington Street and continue on Summer Street. Pass Macy's and Filene's. Turn right on Chauncy Street. 38 Chauncy Street is half a block down on your left.

Biking

If you plan to bike to NEXUS, there are several spots to secure your bicycle nearby.

Parking

Here are some nearby parking options:

Hyatt's Lafayette Garage at the intersection of Chauncy St. and Bedford St.
M-F 5pm-5am $12/night. Sat, Sunday, and holidays $12/12 hours

*Discount Parking: Now available at Lafayette Garage for all event attendees and NEXUS visitors. Nights and weekends (up to 12 hours) 4:00pm-5:00am: $10 maximum rate. Weekdays: $2 off per hour each of 1st two hours. You can get your parking discount by bringing your parking pass to the event registration table or NEXUS front desk.

Pilgrim Garage on Kingston St. between Summer St. and Bedford St.
$6/.5 hrs, $6 additional half hours. Max of $32

Central Parking Systems Washington and De Lafeyette
$5/30 min
$22 Max
Evening rates after 6 M-W $10, Th-Sat $12, All day Sunday $10

125 Summer St.
20 min or less $6
40 min or less $13
$7 each additional 20 min.
Day max till 5am $32

Boylston St. and Tremont St.
$5 up to half hour
Evening $12/3hrs
Enter after 5pm leave before 5am
item.name: Boston CiviCRM - January Meetup!
